description: Returns, adds, edits, and removes federation-related features such as role mappings and connected organization configurations.

Profile.description: The profile is defined in AWS Secret manager. See [Secret Manager Profile setup](../../../examples/profile-secret.yaml).

FederationSettingsId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your federation.

OktaIdpId.description: Unique 20-hexadecimal digit string that identifies the identity provider.

SsoDebugEnabled.description: Flag that indicates whether the identity provider has SSO debug enabled.

AssociatedDomains.description: List that contains the domains associated with the identity provider.

Status.description: String enum that indicates whether the identity provider is active.

IssuerUri.description: Unique string that identifies the issuer of the SAML Assertion.

RequestBinding.description: SAML Authentication Request Protocol HTTP method binding (POST or REDIRECT) that Federated Authentication uses to send the authentication request.

ResponseSignatureAlgorithm.description: Signature algorithm that Federated Authentication uses to encrypt the identity provider signature.

SsoUrl.description: URL that points to the receiver of the SAML authentication request.

DisplayName.description: Human-readable label that identifies the IdP.
